LanguageData.Ratkin_WildChild.title: Раткин дикорожденный
LanguageData.Ratkin_WildChild.baseDescription: Детство [PAWN_nameDef] прошло в дикой природе, без благ цивилизации. Дикая природа закалила [PAWN_possessive], но не наделила надлежащим образованием.
LanguageData.Ratkin_LandRat.title: Раткин подземная крыса
LanguageData.Ratkin_LandRat.baseDescription: Свое место рождения [PAWN_nameDef] помнит как нечто "темное". Долгая жизнь в пещере научила [PAWN_possessive] добывать полезные ресурсы, но когда многие соотечественники отправились на поверхность, решением [PAWN_nameDef] было оставить их позади.
LanguageData.Ratkin_CountryKid.title: Раткин деревенщина
LanguageData.Ratkin_CountryKid.baseDescription: Дедушка и бабушка [PAWN_nameDef] были фермерами. И родители тоже были фермерами. [PAWN_pronoun] также станет фермером согласно их семейным традициям. Это продолжится и впредь.
LanguageData.Ratkin_ShepherdBoy.title: Раткин пастушонок
LanguageData.Ratkin_ShepherdBoy.baseDescription: Детство [PAWN_nameDef] прошло среди самых разнообразных видов домашнего скота. [PAWN_pronoun] считает животных своими друзьями.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Orphan.title: Раткин сирота
LanguageData.Ratkin_Orphan.baseDescription: Родители бросили [PAWN_nameDef] в раннем возрасте. [PAWN_objective] приходится выживать в одиночестве, из-за чего [PAWN_nameDef] не обладает какими-либо специальными знаниями, но зато умеет делать самые разные вещи.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Student.title: Раткин студент
LanguageData.Ratkin_Student.baseDescription: Семья [PAWN_nameDef] имела посредственный денежный достаток, чтобы получить образование. [PAWN_pronoun] талантливо использует свою голову, но тренировки даются [PAWN_objective] с трудом.
LanguageData.Ratkin_LittleLibrarian.title: Раткин маленький библиотекарь
LanguageData.Ratkin_LittleLibrarian.baseDescription: Будучи ребёнком библиотекарей и буквально живя в книгах подобно книжному червю, [PAWN_nameDef] обладает обширными знаниями... и отвратительным зрением в придачу.
LanguageData.Ratkin_GoldenSpoon.title: Ratkin golden spoon
LanguageData.Ratkin_GoldenSpoon.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a whealthy house. [PAWN_pronoun] was surrounded by a variety of artwork but there wasn't much he knew.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Bastard.title: Ratkin bastard
LanguageData.Ratkin_Bastard.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a child of concubine. [PAWN_pronoun] was detected while trying to become inheritor, and became a fugitive.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Successor.title: Ratkin successor
LanguageData.Ratkin_Successor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a heir of noble family. Since the brilliant family tilted, [PAWN_pronoun] had to leave to make it happen.
LanguageData.Ratkin_GuardenerStudent.title: Раткин гвардеец студент
LanguageData.Ratkin_GuardenerStudent.baseDescription: Пешка [PAWN_nameDef] прошла курс обучения, чтобы стать гвардейцем. [PAWN_objective] пришлось приложить усилия, потому что только лучшим дозволено защищать сады общества раткинов. \n\n(Примечание переводчика: на самом деле никаких гвардейцев у раткинов нет, "гвардейцами" зовут раткинов, совмещающих садовое и военное ремесло).
LanguageData.Ratkin_ChefStudent.title: Ratkin Chef Student
LanguageData.Ratkin_ChefStudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] started cooking because liked eating things. For [PAWN_pronoun], food is an enjoyment of life, so leaved for an adventure to eat more delicious food.
LanguageData.Ratkin_RomanyKid.title: Ratkin Romany Kid
LanguageData.Ratkin_RomanyKid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wandered around aimlessly from place to place. [PAWN_pronoun] is versatile, but a wandering life seems to be not enough to have a deep relationship with people.
LanguageData.Ratkin_OfficerChild.title: Ratkin Officer Child
LanguageData.Ratkin_OfficerChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a child of commissioned officer. The shooting skill and charisma that he learned from his parents since his childhood made [PAWN_pronoun] to be a timber of officer, but also made him haughty.
LanguageData.Ratkin_MerchantKid.title: Ratkin Merchant Kid
LanguageData.Ratkin_MerchantKid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a child of merchandiser. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to make money by learning business over parents shoulder.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Kid.title: Ratkin Kid
LanguageData.Ratkin_Kid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is just a kid. learned many things what parents do over shoulder in ordinary family. But couldn't build professional knowledge because didn't have chance to get higher education.
LanguageData.Ratkin_ServentChild.title: Ratkin Servent Child
LanguageData.Ratkin_ServentChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a child of servant. By law, [PAWN_pronoun] is also destined to become a servant, but he ran away to change his destiny.
LanguageData.Ratkin_HumanAssistant.title: Ratkin Human Assistant
LanguageData.Ratkin_HumanAssistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] helped small things since child as a human assistant. But when the owner died in an accident, [PAWN_pronoun] hit the road to find his own life.
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityKid.title: Ratkin City Kid
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityKid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in city. [PAWN_pronoun] was exposed to the civilization of the city, so could understand culture easily unlike other Ratkins.
LanguageData.Ratkin_SlaveKid.title: Ratkin Slave Kid
LanguageData.Ratkin_SlaveKid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] do not know how got here, but had a slave-mark. [PAWN_pronoun] ran away for freedom because couldn't bear all the chores.
LanguageData.Ratkin_LaboratoryRats.title: Ratkin Laboratory Rats
LanguageData.Ratkin_LaboratoryRats.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the lab. One day, [PAWN_pronoun], genetically manipulated as a military rat, felt a deep desire for freedom. so, killed scientists and ran away.
LanguageData.Ratkin_PettyTheft.title: Ratkin Petty Theft
LanguageData.Ratkin_PettyTheft.baseDescription: For [PAWN_nameDef], stealing was just borrowing for a while. [PAWN_pronoun]'s frequent stealing was eventually caught and while being taken as a slave, could have escaped barely because of attack.
LanguageData.Ratkin_CaravanMerchant.title: Ratkin Caravan Merchant
LanguageData.Ratkin_CaravanMerchant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a merchandiser who leads merchants and living a nomadic life. But after being attacked and losing everything, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to live a new life.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Wanderer.title: Ratkin Wanderer
LanguageData.Ratkin_Wanderer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is just a wanderer who lives aimless wandering life. For [PAWN_pronoun], life with gardening is just a specious dream.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Farmer.title: Ratkin Farmer
LanguageData.Ratkin_Farmer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a farmer. [PAWN_pronoun] became a farmer by taking over the parents family business and [PAWN_pronoun]'s kids will be farmer too.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Miner.title: Ratkin Miner
LanguageData.Ratkin_Miner.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had strength in digging, so became a miner. For [PAWN_pronoun], digging ground was a piece of cake, but used to think of running away from this narrow and stuffy place.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Hunter.title: Ratkin Hunter
LanguageData.Ratkin_Hunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a hunter who hunts animals. Unlike the other ratkins, [PAWN_pronoun] had good eyesight so could see animals moving from far away.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Shepherd.title: Ratkin Shepherd
LanguageData.Ratkin_Shepherd.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] runs a farm. [PAWN_pronoun] used to have many livestock, but because of polluted ship crash it's just a past thing now.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Civil.title: Ratkin Civil
LanguageData.Ratkin_Civil.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a citizen of the ratkin kingdom. [PAWN_pronoun] have been leading life with menial tasks inside the kingdom.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Noble.title: Ratkin Noble
LanguageData.Ratkin_Noble.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is noble of the ratkin kingdom. But [PAWN_pronoun], who was forced to go into exile due to the political issues, started wandering life to get back.
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityMerchant.title: Ratkin City Merchant
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityMerchant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a city merchandiser. [PAWN_pronoun] used to sell many kind of things due to the good dexterity.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Librarian.title: Ratkin Librarian
LanguageData.Ratkin_Librarian.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a librarian who protects the library. [PAWN_pronoun] has a lot of academic knowledge, but life with the book seems long enough to forget how to dig.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Guardener.title: Раткин гвардеец
LanguageData.Ratkin_Guardener.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] - опытный гвардеец в обществе раткинов. После одной из опасных миссии в дальних землях, пешка [PAWN_nameDef] осталась одна. Теперь [PAWN_pronoun] хочет найти путь назад в свое королевство. \n\n(Примечание переводчика: на самом деле никаких гвардейцев у раткинов нет, "гвардейцами" зовут раткинов, совмещающих садовое и военное ремесло).
LanguageData.Ratkin_Knight.title: Ratkin Knight
LanguageData.Ratkin_Knight.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is knight of Ratkinia. They are the strong buttresses of the kingdom.
LanguageData.Ratkin_KnightCommander.title: Ratkin Knight commander
LanguageData.Ratkin_KnightCommander.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]is the chosen knight of the Ratkin Kingdom. In accordance with the tradition of knights, the master of knighthood will be chosen from among those from the countryside.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Teacher.title: Ratkin Teacher
LanguageData.Ratkin_Teacher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a teacher who teaches kids. But there was nothing [PAWN_pronoun] could do in a rural village where all the kids had left, so had to go out looking for new home where the beginning is.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Blacksmith.title: Ratkin Blacksmith
LanguageData.Ratkin_Blacksmith.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a blacksmith who makes weapons or tools. [PAWN_pronoun] went on an adventure to search for stronger materials.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Thief.title: Ratkin Thief
LanguageData.Ratkin_Thief.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is sustaining life with stealing day by day. [PAWN_pronoun] repeated leaving to another city when face is known in the city.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Ambassador.title: Ratkin Ambassador
LanguageData.Ratkin_Ambassador.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is ratkin kingdom's diplomat. Due to diplomatic problems, [PAWN_pronoun] is temporarily exiled as an asylum status.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Soldier.title: Ratkin Soldier
LanguageData.Ratkin_Soldier.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a soldier of human city. [PAWN_pronoun] is a soldier who has trained between humans and mastered different battle methods then other ratkins. But was abandoned during a mission, and decided to find a new life.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Explorer.title: Ratkin Explorer
LanguageData.Ratkin_Explorer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was full of curiousity about the world. [PAWN_pronoun] won't stop until explore all of these planetary system.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Chef.title: Ratkin Chef
LanguageData.Ratkin_Chef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a chef who has the desire to cook everything in the world. [PAWN_pronoun] has left on the way to find the best nuts among them.
LanguageData.Ratkin_HandMaiden.title: Ratkin HandMaiden
LanguageData.Ratkin_HandMaiden.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is maid of nobility who is doing from their simple works to their eyes and ears.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Shooter.title: Ratkin Shooter
LanguageData.Ratkin_Shooter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had good eyesight as a ratkin. [PAWN_pronoun] volunteered for the military by using strong point, and thanks to that became a best shooter.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Doctor.title: Ratkin Doctor
LanguageData.Ratkin_Doctor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a doctor of the kingdom, but banished to the outskirts because could not saved the nobility. [PAWN_pronoun] went from place to place trying to sharpen medical skills to prove he wasn't wrong.
LanguageData.Ratkin_ArmySurgeon.title: Ratkin Army Surgeon
LanguageData.Ratkin_ArmySurgeon.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a doctor who saves ratkins in the field of battle. even if they were a small life, [PAWN_pronoun] volunteered up to a sense of kinship and mission, but left the fact that nothing would change.
LanguageData.Ratkin_ConstructionWorker.title: Ratkin Construction Worker
LanguageData.Ratkin_ConstructionWorker.baseDescriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] is a laborer working in the construction site. [PAWN_pronoun] mainly been working on building underground tunnels.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Rich.title: Ratkin Rich
LanguageData.Ratkin_Rich.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had a great talent for cheating people into making money. But soon it was revealed and [PAWN_pronoun] had no choice but to run away.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Sister.title: Ratkin Sister
LanguageData.Ratkin_Sister.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] as a nun, have been taking care of ancestral rites or religious affairs in the ratkin society. [PAWN_pronoun] was attacked while traveling far away for a religious event and was barely able to escape. escape.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Butcher.title: Ratkin Butcher
LanguageData.Ratkin_Butcher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a trader who butchery animals and sell.
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityMaid.title: Ratkin City Maid
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityMaid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a housekeeper who helps housework in the city. Humans usually selected handsome ratkins as a housekeeper and [PAWN_pronoun] was one of them.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Idol.title: Ratkin Idol
LanguageData.Ratkin_Idol.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] have been doing entertainment activity as an idol. Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun]'s car overturned and he opened eyes in an unknown location.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Murderer.title: Ratkin Murderer
LanguageData.Ratkin_Murderer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a ratkin who got crazy in the city. [PAWN_pronoun] kept enjoying murder by using small body to quickly escape from the crime site.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Assistant.title: Ratkin Assistant
LanguageData.Ratkin_Assistant.baseDescription: As a researcher, [PAWN_nameDef] helped with various works from human's small studies to big ones. [PAWN_pronoun] learned those studies over shoulder at every opportunity.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Scientist.title: Ratkin Scientist
LanguageData.Ratkin_Scientist.baseDescription: As a scientist, [PAWN_nameDef] have been studying science among humans. But too much concentrating in studies, [PAWN_pronoun] became physically weak and also eyesight got worse.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Engineer.title: Ratkin Engineer
LanguageData.Ratkin_Engineer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a engineer who used to make precision parts. [PAWN_pronoun] used his talent to make mechanoid but didn't know it would become a source of trouble.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Agriculturist.title: Ratkin Agriculturist
LanguageData.Ratkin_Agriculturist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a agronomist who came out to the city to develop the agricultural system of ratkin. [PAWN_pronoun] is dreaming of going back to the hometown one day, and develop agricultural system.
LanguageData.Ratkin_RatkinHunter.title: RatkinHunter
LanguageData.Ratkin_RatkinHunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a hunter who catches escaped ratkin. But one day, [PAWN_pronoun] left with a sense of skepticism about his job when he saw the young fugitive ratkin.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Subject.title: Ratkin Subject
LanguageData.Ratkin_Subject.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a ratkin subject of experiment. [PAWN_pronoun] been reinforced by a number of experiments, but accident happened during the experiment and could barely escaped.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Vagabond.title: Ratkin Vagabond
LanguageData.Ratkin_Vagabond.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] have been doing a aimless wandering life. [PAWN_pronoun]'s past is not known exactly, but wisdom gained from wandering life seems to be reliable enough.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Demoman.title: Ratkin Demoman
LanguageData.Ratkin_Demoman.baseDescription: Unlike other rats, [PAWN_nameDef] is obsessed with explosions. Ratskin's commandos isolate these dangerous classes and put them on dangerous missions.
